response: Introducing the 2023 Harley Davidson Nightster Special, a new middleweight contender that amplifies the sportster motorcycle experience. It features all LED lighting, premium Brembo braking components, a 3.1-gallon fuel cell for improved handling, selectable ride modes, and adjustable brake and clutch levers. Available in classic and bold colors, it offers a vintage vibe with a 1970s style medallion. The Nightster Special now includes a passenger pillion, footpegs, cast aluminum wheels with a tire pressure monitoring system, and a comfortable five-inch handlebar riser. It also boasts a four-inch TFT screen for infotainment and an onboard USB charging port. Powered by the Revolution Max 975T powertrain, it combines classic style with modern performance. The 2023 Nightster models add excitement to the lineup with enhanced ride quality, convenience, and thrilling performance.
